article.title: Afghanistan Purchases DATRON Radios
article.text:
DATRON World Communications Inc.*, Vista, California, was awarded a $495,000,000 firm-fixed-price, foreign military sales (Afghanistan) contract for DATRON family of radios and support equipment.Â Bids were solicited via the internet with one received. Work locations and funding will be determined with each order, with an estimated completion date of August 30, 2021. The Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity (W91CRB-16-D-5010).
*Small Business
